movie:e328ec26-7a09-4beb-9f68-da29d4d15e.title: Loving Vincent
movie:e328ec26-7a09-4beb-9f68-da29d4d15e.overview: The film brings the paintings of Vincent van Gogh to life to tell his remarkable story. Every one of the 65,000 frames of the film is an oil-painting hand-painted by 125 professional oil-painters who travelled from all across the world to the Loving Vincent studios in Poland and Greece to be a part of the production. As remarkable as Vincent’s brilliant paintings are his passionate and ill-fated life and mysterious death.
